title: Swietemicrolides A–D, mexicanolide-type limonoids from the bark of Swietenia macrophylla with in vitro cytotoxic and α-glucosidase inhibitory activities
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,18608-18616
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01954G, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tu-Quyen Thi Tran, Duong Hoang Trinh, Binh Thi Dieu Trinh, Dzung Ngoc Bui, Lien-Hoa Dieu Nguyen, Phuong Thu Tran
Four new mexicanolide-type limonoids, swietemicrolides A–D (1–4), together with three known compounds (5–7) were isolated from an ethyl acetate extract of the bark of Swietenia microphylla.
